titles.title: Deal with the Debt Today Act
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to establish a disaster and emergency spending financial offset program, and for other purposes.
Deal with the Debt Today Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Deal with the Debt Today Act
This bill generally requires disaster and emergency spending to be paid for over a 10-year period with spending reductions.
